1.title: Don't Save the Date
1.plot: Get to know the Second Wives Club, a group of women whose marriages to the rich, powerful, and previously married men of Hollywood are just as complicated as their relationships with each other. In the series premiere, the drama begins when Tania's save-the-dates go out and not all of the women are invited. Shiva questions Mohamed's commitment to marriage after a two year engagement and no wedding date in sight.

2.title: Mermaid Meltdown
2.plot: Veronika is met with a heartbreaking revelation in her marriage and Shawna interviews with an acting agent. Shiva and Mohamed do a cover shoot for Harpers Bazaar Interior at their mansion.

3.title: We're Going to Need a Big Boat
3.plot: Shawna enlists Katie and Tania's help with her head shots, but tension ensues. Veronika learns more about the affair and Tania's behavior causes the ladies to question her wedding plans.

4.title: Billionaire Matchmaker
4.plot: Veronika struggles with her husband's infidelities. Katie preps for her Grand Opening and inspection test. Shiva and Mohamed make a bet to see who can find a girlfriend for Shiva's brother.

5.title: Fightin' Words
5.plot: Veronika seeks financial advice and Tania tries to make amends with the group. Shawna seeks Lorenzo's support with her new career. Tania's attempt to reconnect with Veronika ends in tension.

6.title: Unhappy Campers
6.plot: Tania and Veronika recover after their fiery fight. Shawna and Lorenzo have a heart to heart that could mean the end. Shiva hosts a camping sleepover, but it takes a turn when Tania arrives.

7.title: Trouble in Paradise
7.plot: Katie shows Shawna just how dirty thirty can be! Meanwhile, after some tough love from Shiva, Veronika finally makes a heart-wrenching decision about her husband.

8.title: Eli Hammond
8.plot: In the season finale, Shiva finally confronts Mohamed about setting a wedding date, but his response is not what she anticipated. Katie finally plans her grand opening for the Tea Shop, but if she doesn't pass one final inspection first, her dreams will go up in smoke. Veronika prepares to take the most difficult step she could have ever imagined in her relationship with her husband.

imdb.plot outline: In Hollywood, second wives are often painted as opportunistic women who swoop in to take advantage of everything their successful husbands have to offer. The eight-episode, hour-long docu-series follows six women who are married or engaged to wealthy, powerful men. Shiva Safai, Katie Cazorla, Veronika Obeng, Shawna Craig, Tania Mehra and Morisa Surrey may indulge in mermaid pool parties, live in multi-million dollar homes and have luxury cars with champagne refrigerators, but that doesn't mean they don't have to navigate the complications that come with having stepchildren, managing their own careers, and being a second, third, fourth or even fifth wife.
imdb.title: Second Wives Club
plot: A reality show that takes a look into the lives of some of hollywood's stars second wives::sarahsalem

In Hollywood, second wives are often painted as opportunistic women who swoop in to take advantage of everything their successful husbands have to offer. The eight-episode, hour-long docu-series follows six women who are married or engaged to wealthy, powerful men. Shiva Safai, Katie Cazorla, Veronika Obeng, Shawna Craig, Tania Mehra and Morisa Surrey may indulge in mermaid pool parties, live in multi-million dollar homes and have luxury cars with champagne refrigerators, but that doesn't mean they don't have to navigate the complications that come with having stepchildren, managing their own careers, and being a second, third, fourth or even fifth wife.
